snippet.title: Top 5 moments at the MTV Movie Awards
snippet.description:
* The 2014 MTV Movie Awards in Los Angeles Sunday were filled with laughs, standout fashion and rocking musical performances.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/14/showbiz/tv/mtv-movie-awards-top-5-moments/index.html

snippet.title: Oscars 2014: 5 things to watch for
snippet.description:
* Ellen DeGeneres! Celebrity controversies! Endless self-congratulation!
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/02/showbiz/movies/oscars-2014-5-things/index.html

snippet.title: Your Johnny Carson memories
snippet.description:
* Johnny Carson died Sunday of emphysema at 79. CNN.com asked people to share their memories of the king of late-night TV. Here is a selection of the e-mails:
http://www.cnn.com/2005/SHOWBIZ/TV/01/23/your.memories/index.html

snippet.title: John 'Rotten' Lydon: I'm not a museum piece
snippet.description:
* John Lydon is wondering whether he's looking old. He jokes that the camera should be smeared with Vaseline to give a flattering, soft-focus effect. "Or we could use butter!" he laughs in reference to a series of TV commercials which helped to fund his band's latest album.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/10/17/showbiz/uk-john-lydon-rotten-pil/index.html

snippet.title: Johnny Carson's final 'Tonight Show' monologue
snippet.description:
* Here is the monologue from Johnny Carson's final "The Tonight Show" on May 22, 1992:
http://www.cnn.com/2005/SHOWBIZ/TV/01/23/carson.monolgue/index.html

snippet.title: Subtle ways to schmooze the boss
snippet.description:
* We all do it: release an extra snicker at a joke, give a casual compliment or have the inclination to agree. We like to hand the boss a little extra attention, secretly hoping it makes us look better in his or her eyes.
http://www.cnn.com/2005/US/Careers/05/25/flattering.boss/index.html

snippet.title: Jay Leno: '10 o'clock is like the new 11:30'
snippet.description:
* Jay Leno plans "something really unusual and different" when he hands over "The Tonight Show" to Conan O'Brien on May 29, 17 years after Johnny Carson left the hosting duties to him.
http://www.cnn.com/2009/SHOWBIZ/TV/05/14/ent.jay.leno/index.html

snippet.title: Johnny Carson's political legacy
snippet.description:
* Before politicians rushed to book face time with Jon Stewart or announced their candidacy on David Letterman or Jay Leno...there was Johnny Carson.
http://www.cnn.com/2005/ALLPOLITICS/01/27/johnny.carson/index.html

snippet.title: Asiaweek
snippet.description:
* Four years ago, there was barely a fresh coffee bean to be had in the whole of China, apart from those used to brew up the bland and expensive fare served in international hotels. If you wanted a decent cup of the real stuff, you probably had to fork out for an airline ticket to Hong Kong. It was this absence of beans that got J...
http://www.cnn.com/ASIANOW/asiaweek/98/0403/feat1.html

snippet.title: Johnny Depp gets his revenge on 'Life's Too Short'
snippet.description:
* The potential we saw last week with "Life's Too Short" was realized on Sunday night as our hero (okay, not so much) Warwick Davis attended a major fan convention in London. Warwick suffered one humiliation after another, including a demanding TV...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2012/02/27/johnny-depp-gets-his-revenge-on-lifes-too-short/
